application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details relating to the Piling Method Statement plan pursuant to condition 28 of planning permission Ref: 193680FUL dated 06.07.2022, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and did not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policy SI 5 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Details of a Piling Method Statement plan pursuant to condition 28 of planning permission Ref: 193680FUL dated 06.07.2022 "Redevelopment to provide part three, part four storey building accommodating 42 self-contained residential units (5 x one bedroom, 37 x two bedroom) with the provision of 145 parking spaces (103 of which are retained as part of the Old Factory Quarter Section 106 Agreement) at ground and basement level; provision of open space, communal amenity space, cycle parking, landscaping and associated works"
